00015 extern std::map< std::string, std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*> > gAnalysedPulseMap;
00016 
00017 SiR2Target::SiR2Target(char *HistogramDirectoryName) :
00018   FillHistBase(HistogramDirectoryName) {
00019 
00020   ftCoincidence = 2000.;
00021   fhSpectrum = new TH1I("hSiR2Spectrum","Spectrum of Silicon Target", 26000, 0., 26000.);
00022 
00023   gDirectory->cd("/");
00024 }

00029 int SiR2Target::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup) {
00030 
00031   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_musc = NULL;
00032   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_targ = NULL;
00033   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_thick = NULL;
00034   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_thin1 = NULL;
00035   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_thin2 = NULL;
00036   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_thin3 = NULL;
00037   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>* pulses_thin4 = NULL;
00038 
00039   // Find the pulses if they exist
00040   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("muSc") == 0) {
00041     std::cout << "INFO: No beam counter hits" << std::endl;
00042     return 0;
00043   } else if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR2-S") == 0) {
00044     std::cout << "INFO: No target hits" << std::endl;
00045     return 0;
00046   } else if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL2-S") == 0) {
00047     std::cout << "INFO: No thick external hits" << std::endl;
00048     return 0;
00049   }
00050   pulses_musc = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("muSc");
00051   pulses_targ = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR2-S");
00052   pulses_thick = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL2-S");
00053   
00054   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-1-S"))
00055     pulses_thin1 = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-1-S");
00056   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-2-S"))
00057     pulses_thin2 = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-2-S");
00058   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-3-S"))
00059     pulses_thin3 = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-3-S");
00060   if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-4-S"))
00061     pulses_thin4 = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-4-S");
00062   if(!(pulses_thin1 || pulses_thin2 || pulses_thin3 || pulses_thin4)) {
00063     std::cout << "INFO: No thin external hits" << std::endl;
00064     return 0;
00065   }
00066 
00067   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iMusc;
00068   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iTarg;
00069   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iThick;
00070   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iThin1;
00071   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iThin2;
00072   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iThin3;
00073   std::vector<TAnalysedPulse*>::iterator iThin4;
00074 
00075   iMusc = pulses_musc->begin();
00076   iTarg = pulses_targ->begin();
00077   iThick = pulses_thick->begin();
00078   if (pulses_thin1)
00079     iThin1 = pulses_thin1->begin();
00080   if (pulses_thin2)
00081     iThin2 = pulses_thin2->begin();
00082   if (pulses_thin3)
00083     iThin3 = pulses_thin3->begin();
00084   if (pulses_thin4)
00085     iThin4 = pulses_thin4->begin();
00086 
00087   double e, t;
00088   for (; iMusc != pulses_musc->end(); ++iMusc) {
00089     e = 0.;
00090     t = (*iMusc)->GetTime();
00091     // Advance target and external detectors to time window, and
00092     // then check that we haven't run out of pulses.
00093     for (; iTarg != pulses_targ->end(); ++iTarg)
00094       if ((*iTarg)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00095         break;
00096     for (; iThick != pulses_thick->end(); ++iThick)
00097       if ((*iThick)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00098         break;
00099     if (pulses_thin1)
00100       for (; iThin1 != pulses_thin1->end(); ++iThin1)
00101         if ((*iThin1)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00102           break;
00103     if (pulses_thin2)
00104       for (; iThin2 != pulses_thin2->end(); ++iThin2)
00105         if ((*iThin2)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00106           break;
00107     if (pulses_thin3)
00108       for (; iThin3 != pulses_thin3->end(); ++iThin3)
00109         if ((*iThin3)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00110           break;
00111     if (pulses_thin4)
00112       for (; iThin4 != pulses_thin4->end(); ++iThin4)
00113         if ((*iThin4)->GetTime() - t >= -ftCoincidence)
00114           break;
00115     // Check we didn't run out of pulses
00116     if (iTarg == pulses_targ->end()) {
00117       break;
00118     } else if ((*iTarg)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00119       e = (*iTarg)->GetEnergy();
00120       ++iTarg;
00121     } else {
00122       continue;
00123     }
00124     if (iThick == pulses_thick->end()) {
00125       break;
00126     } else if ((*iThick)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00127       e += (*iThick)->GetEnergy();
00128       ++iThick;
00129     } else {
00130       continue;
00131     }
00132     bool pulse_found = false;
00133     bool out_of_pulses = true;
00134     if (pulses_thin1) {
00135       if (iThin1 != pulses_thin1->end()) {
00136         out_of_pulses = false;
00137         if ((*iThin1)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00138           e += (*iThin1)->GetEnergy();
00139           ++iThin1;
00140           pulse_found = true;
00141         }
00142       }
00143     }
00144     if (pulses_thin2) {
00145       if (iThin2 != pulses_thin2->end()) {
00146         out_of_pulses = false;
00147         if ((*iThin2)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00148           e += (*iThin2)->GetEnergy();
00149           ++iThin2;
00150           pulse_found = true;
00151         }
00152       }
00153     }
00154     if (pulses_thin3) {
00155       if (iThin3 != pulses_thin3->end()) {
00156         out_of_pulses = false;
00157         if ((*iThin3)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00158           e += (*iThin3)->GetEnergy();
00159           ++iThin3;
00160           pulse_found = true;
00161         }
00162       }
00163     }
00164     if (pulses_thin4) {
00165       if (iThin4 != pulses_thin4->end()) {
00166         out_of_pulses = false;
00167         if ((*iThin4)->GetTime() - t < ftCoincidence) {
00168           e += (*iThin4)->GetEnergy();
00169           ++iThin4;
00170           pulse_found = true;
00171         }
00172       }
00173     }
00174     if (out_of_pulses)
00175       break;
00176     else if (!pulse_found)
00177       continue;
00178     // Fill the energy
00179     fhSpectrum->Fill(e);
00180   }
00181   return 0;
00182 }
